Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> We are working hard to get some SilentDragon binaries out

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I think that putting a working thing in peoples hands, and seeing people post screenshots of that thing to twitter, is probably the #1 way to increase the price of Hush right now

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Intrinsic value

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I want people to be using Hush for what it is meant to do, the memo field is coming alive, finally

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> the memo field is usable in the first release of SD

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> it's basic, but useful. You can send a full anon memo, or give a reply address

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> and the GUI has some shortcuts like "right click on address, and an action item like Send Memo appears"

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> so 2 way memos are working in this release

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> 1 way or 2 way

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> But a "chat ui" is not there, that will come in our next release. A UI geared towards chatting versus "sending money with optional messages"

Author: Gateway#3763

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <AkiraX> Will chatting cost hush?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> each message (memo) costs a transaction fee, so 0.0001 HUSH by default

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> larges file require multiple tx fees to store/send

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> it's still possible to send txfee=0 things on Hush network, but that won't last forever

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Miners decide which transactions to include

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> most hush miners are nice and will include txfee=0, but most ZEC miners will not, for instance

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <AkiraX> I'm a hush miner.   I don't think I have decided anything.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> If chatting is popular on Hush platform, Hush miners make more money

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> more transactions => more block reward
